titles.title: Enhanced Protection of the Internal Revenue Service and Its Employees Act of 2007
To provide for enhanced protection of the Internal Revenue Service and employees of the Internal Revenue Service.
Enhanced Protection of the Internal Revenue Service and Its Employees Act of 2007

bill.summary: Enhanced Protection of the Internal Revenue Service and Its Employees Act of 2007 - Amends the Inspector General Act of 1978 to eliminate the exception to the duties of the Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration for protecting the physical security of Internal Revenue Service (IRS) employees.
